Grad Cafe Analytics
  • API Reference
  • View page source

API Reference

app

Flask web app for Grad Cafe analysis page.

Routes:
/analysis

Render the analysis page.

/scrape-status

Report whether a scrape is running.

/pull-data

Start the scrape/clean pipeline.

/update-analysis Allow UI to refresh analysis when idle.

app.create_app()

Create and configure the Flask application.

db_connection

Database connection helper for PostgreSQL.

db_connection.get_connection()

Return a psycopg connection using environment variables.

Returns:

A live database connection or None on failure.

Return type:

connection or None

load_data

Load cleaned JSON data into PostgreSQL.

load_data.infer_term(date_str, status_str)

Infer a Fall term from date_added or status strings.

Parameters:

  • date_str – Date string like “January 01, 2026”.

  • status_str – Status string like “Accepted on 01/15/2026”.

Returns:

Term like “Fall 2026”, or None if unknown.

Return type:

str or None

load_data.main()

Create the applicants table and load JSON rows into PostgreSQL.

load_data.parse_date(date_str)

Parse a GradCafe date string into a date object.

load_data.try_float(value)

Convert a string to float; return None if invalid.

query_data

Run analysis queries and print results.

query_data.get_sample_applicant_dict(table_name='applicants_db_test')

Return one applicant row as a dict for testing.

Parameters:

table_name – Name of the table to query.

Returns:

One row as a dict, or None if unavailable.

Return type:

dict or None

query_data.main()

Execute analysis queries and print results to the console.

Scraper.main

Orchestrate the scrape -> clean pipeline with a local LLM server.

main.json_sanity_check(path)

Basic JSON check: can we load it and is it a list?

main.main()

Run the full pipeline: start LLM, scrape, validate, clean.

main.run_scrape()

Run scrape.py as a subprocess and return its exit code.

main.start_llm_server()

Start the local LLM server in the background.

main.wait_for_file(path, timeout_seconds=300)

Wait for a file to exist within a timeout window.

main.wait_for_llm(timeout_seconds=300)

Poll the LLM health endpoint until ready or timed out.

Scraper.scrape

Scrape GradCafe survey pages and extract raw application data.

scrape.download_html(url: str) → str

Download and decode HTML with retry handling.

scrape.extract_result_id(url: str)

Extract the numeric result_id from a GradCafe result URL.

scrape.extract_term_from_detail_row(detail_text: str)

Extract a term from the detail row text.

scrape.extract_term_from_text(text: str)

Find a term like ‘Fall 2026’ in plain text.

scrape.extract_text(html_text: str) → str

Return visible text from an HTML page.

scrape.infer_term_from_row(program_text: str, status_text: str, comments_text: str)

Infer a term from combined program, status, and comments text.

scrape.load_data(filename: str) → list[dict]

Load scraped rows from JSON; return [] if missing or invalid.

scrape.parse_date_added(date_string: str)

Parse a GradCafe date string into a datetime.

scrape.save_data(data, filename: str) → None

Save scraped rows to JSON.

scrape.scrape_data(page_url: str, existing_ids: set) → tuple[list[dict], bool]

Scrape one survey page and return rows plus a stop flag.

Scraper.clean

Clean scraped GradCafe data and load into JSON/PostgreSQL.

clean.append_rows_to_master(new_rows, master_path='llm_extend_applicant_data.json')

Append new rows to the master JSON file with dedupe.

clean.chunked(lst, size)

Yield chunks of a list with a fixed size.

clean.clean_data(extracted_fields_raw, llm_url='http://127.0.0.1:8000/standardize')

Clean raw rows and return cleaned outputs.

clean.clean_program_cell(program_text)

Strip extra info from the program cell.

clean.clean_whitespace(text)

Normalize whitespace; return None for None input.

clean.extract_country_origin(text)

Extract country of origin (Domestic/International).

clean.extract_decision(text)

Extract decision text (Accepted/Rejected/etc.).

clean.extract_degree_type(text)

Extract degree type (e.g., MS, PhD).

clean.extract_gre_aw(text)

Extract GRE analytical writing score from text.

clean.extract_gre_general(text)

Extract GRE general score from text.

clean.extract_gre_verbal(text)

Extract GRE verbal score from text.

clean.extract_notes(text)

Extract the Notes section from result text.

clean.extract_notification_date(text)

Extract notification date in MM/DD/YYYY format.

clean.extract_term_year(text)

Extract term and year, normalizing Autumn to Fall.

clean.extract_undergrad_gpa(text)

Extract undergrad GPA from text.

clean.insert_rows_into_postgres(rows, table_name='applicants')

Insert cleaned rows into PostgreSQL with upsert.

clean.load_data(input_path='raw_scraped_data.json')

Load raw scraped rows from JSON.

clean.main()

Run clean -> append -> save -> insert pipeline.

clean.normalize_zero(value)

Convert zero-like strings to None.

clean.save_data(final_rows, output_path)

Save cleaned rows to JSON.
